content.raw:
Looks good to me:

 * [Trusty is ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/25/)
 * [Brew is ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/15/)
 * [Windows is ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/26/)

I miss the reason why we are changing this in the pull request content and I'm not sure about downstream possible implications of changing link names, maybe we need a Changelog entry?
Approved anyway.
